page.title: 14A VILLAGE FETE
page.content: Fetes are fund raising events, also entertainments where people come to have fun.They take a long time to organise and to prepare the different stalls.There are lots of stalls e.g White elephant,Lucky Dip,Pick an Egg,Wet Sponge Throwing at someone,Coconut Shy,Pony and Tractor rides,Cake Stall,Skittle,Wacka Rat,Ice cream van and more. Also there are fun sports which includes,throwing the wellie ,shooting a netball, bean bag race ,egg and spoon, quoits on a pole, hula hoop,skipping race,skittles,dressing up,hoop race,ball on targets,football. Most fetes have a main attraction eg.balloon rides helicopter rides.Fetes are good fun!
